name: The Old Spooky House for ICD
name_original: The Old Spooky House for ICD
description:
Hello! This is my first game that I have ever created from start to finish so I am really excited to show you guys what I made. Also, Just as a heads up, it might be a little spooky for some, but Enjoy!!

Jamming Way

PS. I ran out of time before I could create an exit screen at the end of the game so open up you task manager (ctrl + alt + delete) and close it from there (Sorry about that!).

Credits:

Special thanks to Brackeys and BlackthornProd for their awesome youtueb tutorials

Music: DarkWaryuMC

Creepy Ambient Sound: Marissror
